word_mean: 乙酰胆碱：胆碱的可逆性乙酸酯和胆碱能促效药，CH3·CO·O·CH2·CH2·N(CH3)3·OH，正常情况下存在于体内多种组织中，且具有重要生理作用。在下列部位为神经递质：横纹肌的接头处、交感神经和副交感神经系统的节前突触处、副交感神经支配的自主效应细胞以及中枢神经系统各部位。其作用弥散且可被胆碱酯酶迅速水解，故几无治疗用途，但其合成衍生物的作用则较特异和持久

sentence.Network_en: All of these reactions are indications of too much acetylcholine activity.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有这些反应都是乙酰胆碱活性过强的象征.

sentence.Network_en: Acetylcholine, amino acids and NTFS contained in NDT may account for the effects.

sentence.Network_en: The brain uses it to make the neurotransmitter acetylcholine.
sentence.Network_cn: 大脑利用这种物质生成神经递质的乙酰胆碱.

means.word_mean: 1. a neurotransmitter that is a derivative of choline; released at the ends of nerve fibers in the somatic and parasympathetic nervous systems

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, Dr. Hensch's group found that infusions of drugs that raise acetylcholine could make the mice's brains more adaptable.
